api-token.tooltip: API token from finnhub.io (required for stock data)

stock-symbol.tooltip: Stock symbol to monitor (e.g., NVDA, AAPL, TSLA)

update-interval.tooltip: How often to fetch new stock data (1-60 minutes)

show-current-price.tooltip: Display current stock price in the panel

show-daily-range.tooltip: Display daily high and low prices

show-panel-chart.tooltip: Display mini price chart directly on the panel

show-symbol-on-panel.description: Show stock symbol on panel chart
show-symbol-on-panel.tooltip: Display the stock symbol on the panel chart

chart-width.tooltip: Width of the price chart in pixels

chart-area-transparency.tooltip: Controls the transparency of the chart background area (0.0 = fully transparent, 1.0 = fully opaque)

chart-line-color.tooltip: Color for the chart line and indicators

chart-area-color.tooltip: Color for the filled area under the chart line

font-size.tooltip: Font size for price and symbol text on the chart (6-20 pixels)

font-color.tooltip: Color for price and symbol text

enable-font-shadow.tooltip: Draw a shadow under text for better readability
